short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize Your Way to Better AppSheet Apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Powerful Enhancements for a Streamlined AppSheet Experience

We're thrilled to unveil a suite of improvements designed to elevate your AppSheet workflow:

Double-Click Copying: Streamline data configuration with the introduction of double-click copying within your columns. This extension empowers you to effortlessly copy content, saving you valuable time when customizing your data display.

Enhanced Data Display: Experience a more refined and informative data presentation. We've meticulously eliminated extraneous columns, maximized the display area, and meticulously fine-tuned display elements to ensure clarity and efficiency.
Developed by HoaData (hocdatacunghoa).
